LanguageData.CM_Desperate_Hunger_Settings_Feature_Ena: Disable this to turn off feature without needing to uninstall mod
LanguageData.CM_Desperate_Hunger_Settings_Desperate_P: If enabled, desperate predators may hunt animals of any size.
If enabled, desperate normally non-predatory animals may hunt animals of any size. If disabled, they will only hunt animals their own size or smaller.

If enabled, desperate normally non-predatory animals will pick a target at random (always equal size to themself or smaller). If disabled, they prioritize targets using the same formula as predators (and may attack larger creatures if the previous setting is enabled).
LanguageData.CM_Desperate_Hunger_Settings_Desperate_A: If enabled, desperate animals may hunt animals regardless of the targets combat power
LanguageData.CM_Desperate_Hunger_Settings_Desperate_H: Desperate herd animals eat own kind
If enabled, desperate herd animals may hunt animals of their own kind
LanguageData.CM_Desperate_Hunger_Settings_Minimum_Mal: Minimum malnutrition required to hunt healthy target
A desperate creature with malnutrition below this level will hunt wounded targets that they wouldn't normally hunt. Above this level and they will hunt healthy targets as well.
